text: Welcome to the team. We're thrilled to have you on board. If you have any questions during your onboarding, don't hesitate to ask. Thanks, Maria. I appreciate that. I'm eager to get started. Great to hear that. Now, first things first. Install the development environment correctly, and you'll be all set to start coding. How can I do this? If I follow the installation guide step by step, everything should work smoothly, right? Exactly. It's crucial for a seamless setup. In case you see any unfamiliar terms or concepts, always check the documentation. The documentation is a valuable resource. Thanks, Maria. I'll keep that in mind. One last thing. We're a collaborative team, and supporting each other is key to our success. So don't hesitate to ask for help from the team if you need it. Welcome again. Thank you. I'm looking forward to contributing to the team.
